text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing
In the nighttime breeze
Stars above are showing
Dreams are wild and free

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo softly
Down the empty street
Neon signs are calling
Feel the endless beat

[Chorus]
Neon nights glowing bright
Shining in the dark
Paradise under lights
Sparks that leave a mark

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the shadows
Colors paint the sky
Echoes of tomorrow
Seen by every eye

[Bridge]
Hearts are racing faster
To the rhythm's sound
Lost in this disaster
Magic all around

[Chorus]
Neon nights glowing bright
Shining in the dark
Paradise under lights
Sparks that leave a mark
title: Neon Nights
